type.name: org.gradle.api.tasks.compile.AbstractCompile
type.description: The base class for all JVM-based language compilation tasks.

method.name: setDestinationDir
method.description:
Sets the directory to generate the .class files into.
param:destinationDir The destination directory. Must not be null.

method.name: getClasspath
method.description:
Returns the classpath to use to compile the source files.

returns:The classpath.

method.name: getSourceCompatibility
method.description:
Returns the Java language level to use to compile the source files.

returns:The source language level.

method.name: getTargetCompatibility
method.description:
Returns the target JVM to generate the .class files for.

returns:The target JVM.

method.name: setSourceCompatibility
method.description:
Sets the Java language level to use to compile the source files.
param:sourceCompatibility The source language level. Must not be null.

method.name: setTargetCompatibility
method.description:
Sets the target JVM to generate the .class files for.
param:targetCompatibility The target JVM. Must not be null.

method.name: getDestinationDir
method.description:
Returns the directory to generate the .class files into.

returns:The destination directory.

method.name: setClasspath
method.description:
Sets the classpath to use to compile the source files.
param:configuration The classpath. Must not be null, but may be empty.

property.name: sourceCompatibility
property.description:
Returns the Java language level to use to compile the source files.

returns:The source language level.

property.name: targetCompatibility
property.description:
Returns the target JVM to generate the .class files for.

returns:The target JVM.

property.name: classpath
property.description:
Returns the classpath to use to compile the source files.

returns:The classpath.

property.name: destinationDir
property.description:
Returns the directory to generate the .class files into.

returns:The destination directory.
